title: SHOK ULTRA
long_description: SHOK ULTRA is a chlorine-free shock treatment that actively eliminates organic waste such as perspiration, body oil and cosmetics that accumulate in pool water. Its fast-acting, chlorine-free formula is odourless and prevents eye and skin irritation due to high chlorine levels. SHOK ULTRA is not affected by the sun’s ultraviolet rays.
short_description: BENEFITS Eliminates organic waste No chlorine odour Reduces eye and skin irritation FORMATS Pouch of 300 g, 6 kg and 18 kg

characteristics.title: Recommended levels
characteristics.text: Maintain recommended daily levels as determined by testing kit. Free available chlorine: 1.0 – 3.0 ppm pH: 7.2 – 7.8 Total alkalinity: 80 – 120 ppm Calcium hardness: 200 – 300 ppm

characteristics.title: Application method
characteristics.text: Sprinkle SHOK ULTRA directly over the surface of the water while walking all around the pool. OR: Pour product directly into the skimmer basket while the filter is running.

characteristics.title: Instructions
characteristics.text: Add SHOK ULTRA according to chosen application method. Wait for 30 minutes before entering the pool.

characteristics.title: Note
characteristics.text: Higher doses may be required in hot weather, after rain or when pool is used heavily.

dosage.specifications: Add 75 g of SHOK ULTRA per 10,000 L of pool water every week.

warning: Compatible with salt systems. DO NOT apply the product at the same time as adding salt. DO NOT apply the product when people are in the pool.
